metadata.title: CVE-2017-7246 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the pcre32_copy_substring function inpcre_get.c in libpcre1 in PCRE 8.40 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (WRITE of size 268) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: pcre3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
